item.title: About
item.description: Well, thanks for the interest, truly, but if you are here, we probably are much alike or have similar interests. Soooo, no big surprises here… I’m John, and I’ve worked as both network and voice (UC) engineer my entire career and always for large(r) multinational enterprises.

item.title: Test Post
item.description: Test One # Just a test post to verify functionality. print("Hello, world!") for i in range(10): print(i)
